explains: n. 摊牌；紧要关头；最后一决胜负

sentences.en: They may be pushing the president toward a final showdown with his party.
sentences.cn: 他们可能会逼迫总统与其政党做最后的较量。

sentences.en: It promises to be a good showdown.
sentences.cn: 这将是一场精彩的摊牌。

sentences.en: A showdown benefited both of them.
sentences.cn: 最后一决胜负的时刻对两党都有利。
